content: Warlords of Draenor (2014) sent players to an alternate-timeline Draenor before its destruction.
It focused on the Iron Horde, led by Grommash Hellscream and other orc warlords.
Players built their own Garrison, a customizable base that produced resources and followers.
Character models were completely revamped for all original races.
Raids like Highmaul and Blackrock Foundry challenged players at level 100.
Professions became tied to Garrisons and lost daily cooldowns for key crafts.
A prototype Garrison building called 'Chronomancerâ€™s Hall' existed in early builds. (EASTER_EGG)
